title: EvoScope: Live evolutionary viz (lineages + ROI + merges)
description:
Design + build an evocative, evolution-themed visualization that makes the ecology feel alive.

V1 (static HTML over a run dir)
- Input: <run_dir> with gen_summaries.jsonl + assimilation.jsonl (+ episodes.jsonl optional).
- Output: <run_dir>/evoscope/index.html (single-file Plotly + CSS), <run_dir>/evoscope/assets/*.png (exported frames).
- Views:
  1) Lineage graph: nodes=organelles, edges=promotions/merges; size=energy, color=ROI (last 5-gen avg); tooltips with trait/ROI/energy; merges glow.
  2) Timeline: animated scatter (ROI vs cost) per generation; merges flash; overlays for energy floor and episodes; scrubber to scrub gens.
  3) MAP‑Elites grid: family×depth heatmap (success_ema), coverage counter; click to filter lineage/timeline to that niche.
  4) Eco-dials: energy Gini, effective population, trials/promotions counters, CI‑excludes‑zero rate, power mean (latest window).
- Aesthetics: “Cambrian glow” palette; soft neon for merges/promotions; gridlines minimal; dark theme.
- Implementation: Python generator (scripts/visualize_evolution.py) using Plotly; networkx for layout; no server required.
- Acceptance: works on any completed run dir; opens offline; tooltips; generates a PNG composite snapshot (social share).

V2 (live tail)
- Add --live mode: tail gen_summaries.jsonl + assimilation.jsonl, auto-refresh every N seconds; minimal JS to fetch updated data.
- Optional: textual TUI with live spark-lines for headless runs.

Data model
- Parse gen_summaries.jsonl for per-gen metrics + trials/promotions.
- Parse assimilation.jsonl for attempts (uplift, p, CI/power) + decisions.
- Derive lineages from promotions and organelle lifespans.

Risks/Notes
- Tooling: keep deps minimal (plotly, networkx). No heavy web stacks.
- Scale: cap nodes in lineage (collapse retired) to keep graph readable; provide filter.
- Privacy: no user prompts in plots; only telemetry fields.

Done when
- One command produces the HTML viz for a run dir and a snapshot image; docs in README with a GIF example.
notes: EvoScope CLI now builds Chart.js dashboard from run dirs (scripts/evoscope.py); analyzer wiring ensures visuals; tests/test_evoscope.py and tests/test_evoscope_anim*.py cover layout.

title: Colony-level selection: pooled energy + group ROI + group inheritance
description:
Make interacting organelles a true colony by selecting at the group level, not just individuals.

Scope (V1)
- Group model: introduce  and a  mapping colony -> members. Start with static partitioning (random or size-balanced) and a flag to enable.
- Pooled energy: add a group energy account in the ledger; collect a small per-episode tax (e.g., 10%) into the colony pool; allow group subsidies back to low-balance members.
- Group ROI: track colony ROI as weighted mean of member ROI (weights by cost or tokens). Expose group-level CI/power from member attempts.
- Group selection: every , compute group fitness F = α*ROI + β*diversity + γ*comms_productivity (flags); retire the worst colony and replicate the best (split members with small mutations). Respect max/min colony sizes.
- Group assimilation: per-colony trial soup of top-k members (weights ∝ ROI×EMA×co-routing) producing a colony child; promote only if ΔROI_holdout>margin with CI support. Log as group-level event.
- Group traits (inheritable): {tax_rate, subsidy_policy, comms_budget_frac, cohesion_weight}. Mutate on replication; in colony merges/offspring, average traits (weights from soup).
- Telemetry: colony dashboards (energy pool, ROI, membership), lineage graph of colonies, promotions/culls, and group merges. Analyzer: new section with colony KPIs.
- Flags/Config: , , , , , with safe defaults; A/B toggle.

Risks & guards
- Free-riders: require minimal individual contribution; cap per-member subsidy; penalize chronic non-contributors.
- Monopoly: cap colony energy share; enforce inter-colony diversity.
- Complexity: keep V1 static groups; dynamic coalition formation is V2.

Acceptance
- With , analyzer shows colony metrics; pooled energy taxes/subsidies apply; group selection and per-colony trial soups run; at least one colony promotion passes holdout with CI support on a seed run. Tests cover group ledger math, selection, and assimilation gating.
notes: Colony selection loop now handles pooled pots, selection pool, replication tiers (_colony_selection_step/_tick_colonies); analyzer and README report colony metrics; tests/test_colony_adaptation.py cover selection, taxation, events.

title: Ephemeral team probes + synergy detector
description:
Detect sustained superadditivity + stability before promoting to colonies.

Scope
- Sample pairs/triads episodically (no selection change) on matched shadow batches; log ROI_team vs ROI_solo per window.
- Compute synergy S = ROI_team − Σ ROI_solo and variance delta ΔVar = Var(team) − min Var(solo).
- Promotion gate when sustained for M windows: S ≥ δ·Σ ROI_solo and ΔVar ≤ −ν·min Var(solo); verify on holdout + under price/difficulty shifts.
- Defaults: δ∈[0.10,0.20], ν∈[0.20,0.30], M∈[3,5].
- Telemetry: windowed S, ΔVar, holdout confirmation; analyzer page for team probes.

Acceptance
- Team probes run without affecting selection; analyzer reports teams that meet thresholds; unit tests cover matched-batch logic and stats.

title: Colony reserve/hazard/winter survival policy
description:
Conservative survival instincts for colonies to avoid collapse.

Scope
- Reserve rule: maintain pot ≥ max(3×ticket, ρ × expected 1k-step costs). If below reserve, freeze reproduction, cut exploration.
- Hazard mode: if rolling ROI z-score < −κ, pivot to cheap tasks, shrink ranks temporarily ("winter").
- Variance leash: if Var(team ROI) rises beyond band, force diversification or split colony.
- Anti-cannibalism: penalize colonies that bankrupt members; dissolve on repeated violations.
- Deception guards: periodic canaries, masked-message evals, A/B routers to catch collusion.
- Defaults: ρ=0.25, κ tuned from baseline; flags to enable.

Acceptance
- Policy toggles compile; analyzer shows reserve/hazard/winter events; tests cover reserve math and hazard triggers.

Scope
- Reserve: maintain pot ≥ max(alpha×ticket, beta×expected K‑step costs). If below reserve → freeze merges, cut exploration/comms, prefer cheap cells, shrink batch.
- Hazard mode (rolling ROI z‑score < −κ): downshift rank/active layers, disable expensive probes, boost tau/ROI relief rate.
- Telemetry: hazard/reserve flags, reserve breaches, per‑gen hazard entries/exits.
- Knobs: reserve_ratio, hazard_k (window), hazard_threshold, rank_downshift, probe_disable_in_hazard, cheap_cells_bias, steps_cap_low_energy.

Acceptance
- Reserve/hazard states toggle under stress in a 40‑gen smoke; insufficient_scores and skip_low_roi trend down; assimilation_attempt_total trends up.

comments.text: Implemented reserve + hazard survival loop: new survival config, reserve guards gating merges, adaptive hazard relief/downshift, analyzer plots/JSON, tests covering throttled batch sampling and top-up bonuses.

title: Winter cycles: stress thrift, measure recovery
description:
Introduce periodic ‘winter’ pulses (every W gens) that raise prices and/or lower ticket to harden thrift.

Scope
- Apply winter deltas for a short window; then revert.
- Track survival metrics: bankrupt culls during winter, ROI recovery after.
- Reward survivors with small reserve bonuses post‑winter.
- Telemetry: winter windows, deltas, survival outcomes.
- Knobs: winter_interval, winter_price_delta, winter_ticket_delta, post_winter_bonus.

Acceptance
- In 2× 40‑gen runs, colony/population remain viable; post‑winter ROI recovers to pre‑winter band within N gens; assimilation_attempt_total does not crater during winter.

title: Price‑aware foraging & cautious merges
description:
Route cheaply when low on energy; block risky operations until stable.

Scope
- Price‑aware foraging: if below reserve/hazard, bias controller to low‑price cells and cap max_episode_steps; restore ALP/UCB when recovered.
- Cautious merges: while in hazard or below reserve, skip merges or require higher holdout power/margin; log ‘cautious_skip’ events.
- Telemetry: price bias activations, cautious merge skips.
- Knobs: price_bias_low_energy, steps_cap_low_energy, hazard_holdout_margin, min_power_recovery.

Acceptance
- In smoke runs, low‑energy phases show price bias on; merge attempts suppressed during hazard; more DR attempts observed overall as evidence accumulates.

title: Colony size and bandwidth adaptation (expand/shrink + priced comms)
description:
Adapt colony size and communication budget based on measured synergy and variance.

Scope

- Bandwidth: per-colony message_budget = min(base, k * pot); teacher-credit required; hazard mode slashes budget; cap per-gen posts/reads.
- Config: colony.min_size, colony.max_size, colony.expand_delta, colony.variance_improve, colony.windows, colony.bandwidth_frac, colony.post/read caps.
- Telemetry: colonysize_t, promotions/dissolutions, comms volume, ΔROI distributions; analyzer plots.

Acceptance
